skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Offensive (破艇魚雷．傷)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Z1's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
2. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.

skills.name: First of the Z-Series (Z型筆頭)
skills.text:
1. When the Fleet is sailing at Full Speed, fatigue buildup is reduced by 50%.
2. During battle, if an enemy is sunk by [Flooding] damage, 100% chance to reload a [Torpedo Salvo] charge on a random Allied ship capable of arming torpedo.
